mapper.select: SELECT /* COBDashBoardMapper.getEduCnt */ IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ACCS_STATUS_NM = '접수중' THEN 1 END), 0)AS edu_accepting , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN edctn_status_nm = '교육대기' THEN 1 END), 0) AS edu_accept_waiting , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN edctn_status_nm = '교육중' THEN 1 END ), 0) AS edu_accept_training FROM (SELECT DATEDIFF(accs_end_dtm, NOW()) AS accs_order_day , accs_strt_dtm , accs_end_dtm , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '접수대기' when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '접수중' when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '마감' END AS accs_status_nm , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '2' when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '1' when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '3' END AS accs_status_order , edctn_strt_dtm , edctn_end_dtm , case when edctn_stts_cd = 'EDCTN_STTS_CD01' then /*개강일 경우*/ case when NOW() < edctn_strt_dtm then '교육대기' when NOW() > edctn_strt_dtm AND NOW() < edctn_end_dtm then '교육중' when NOW() > edctn_end_dtm then '교육완료' end when edctn_stts_cd = 'EDCTN_STTS_CD02' then '교육취소' /*폐강일 경우*/ END AS edctn_status_nm FROM (SELECT a.accs_strt_dtm , a.accs_end_dtm , a.edctn_strt_dtm , a.edctn_end_dtm , a.edctn_stts_cd , a.fxnum_cnt , a.fxnum_impsb_yn , (SELECT count(mem_seq) FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst WHERE edctn_seq = a.edctn_seq AND episd_year = a.episd_year AND episd_ord = a.episd_ord AND stts_cd = 'EDU_STTS_CD01') AS accs_cnt , a.reg_id , (select name from co_adm_mst where id = a.reg_id) as reg_name , a.reg_dtm , a.mod_id , (select name from co_adm_mst where id = a.reg_id) as mod_name FROM ed_edctn_episd_mst a LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_prcs_mst b ON a.edctn_seq = b.edctn_seq LEFT JOIN (SELECT place_seq, nm, bsc_addr, dtl_addr, zipcode, rprsnt_tel_no FROM ed_edctn_place_mst ) c ON a.place_seq = c.place_seq ) AA ) TBL

SELECT /* COBDashBoardMapper.getConCnt */ Count(CASE WHEN a.rsume_stts_cd in ( 'MNGTECH_STATUS_01' ,'MNGTECH_STATUS_03' ,'MNGTECH_STATUS_05','MNGTECH_STATUS_06') THEN 1 END) AS con_tech_application, Count(CASE WHEN a.rsume_stts_cd in ( 'MNGTECH_STATUS_08' ,'MNGTECH_STATUS_09' ,'MNGTECH_STATUS_10','MNGTECH_STATUS_13') THEN 1 END) AS con_tech_training, Count( CASE WHEN a.rsume_stts_cd in ( 'MNGCNSLT_STATUS01', 'MNGCNSLT_STATUS03','MNGCNSLT_STATUS05', 'MNGCNSLT_STATUS06', 'MNGCNSLT_STATUS07') THEN 1 END) AS con_mng_application, Count( CASE WHEN a.rsume_stts_cd in ('MNGCNSLT_STATUS09','MNGCNSLT_STATUS12') THEN 1 END) AS con_mng_training FROM cp_cnstg_appctn_mst a
SELECT /* COBDashBoardMapper.getNoticeList */ NTFY_SEQ , TITL , REG_DTM FROM BD_NTFY_MST WHERE EXPS_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT /* COBDashBoardMapper.getInquiryCnt */ IFNULL(SYS_CNT, 0) AS inquiry_application_waiting , IFNULL(SYNACK_CNT, 0) AS inquiry_application_completed FROM ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN RSUME_CD = 'SYN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SYS_CNT /* 접수 대기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RSUME_CD = 'SYNACK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SYNACK_CNT /* 접수 완료 */ FROM BD_QA_MST A JOIN CO_MEM_MST MEM ON A.REG_ID = MEM.ID JOIN BD_QA_CTGRY_DTL CT ON A.QA_SEQ = CT.QA_SEQ WHERE DATE(A.REG_DTM) = CURDATE() ) AA;

select /* COBDashBoardMapper.getMemberCnt */ ( select count(*) from co_mem_mst a where a.mem_cd='CO' and DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dtm , '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() and a.wthdrw_yn='Y') as general_mem_join ,( select count(*) from co_mem_mst a where a.mem_cd='CP' and a.wthdrw_yn='Y' and DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dtm , '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as company_mem_join ,(select count(*) from co_mem_mst a inner join co_mem_wthdrw_dtl b on a.mem_seq = b.mem_seq where a.wthdrw_yn ='N' and a.mem_cd = 'CO' and DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_dtm , '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as general_mem_secession ,( select count(*) from co_mem_mst a inner join co_mem_wthdrw_dtl b on a.mem_seq = b.mem_seq where a.wthdrw_yn ='N' and a.mem_cd = 'CP' and DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_dtm , '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as company_mem_secession from dual;
